title: Onekoo Marketplace
description: A scalable, high-performance multi-vendor e-commerce platform designed to connect local artisans with international markets.
content: Onekoo required a robust digital infrastructure to handle thousands of concurrent users during seasonal sales. The goal was to build a platform that not only facilitates transactions but also tells the story of the artisans.
development: Built using a microservices architecture to ensure that the payment processing, inventory management, and user authentication services operate independently. We implemented Server-Side Rendering (SSR) for SEO optimization.
ui_ux_strategy: Focused on a 'discovery-first' approach. We utilized large imagery and a minimalist interface to let the products stand out. The checkout flow was reduced to 3 steps to minimize cart abandonment.

title: OCFCU FinConnect
description: A secure mobile financial application enabling cooperative members to manage savings, loans, and transfers on the go.
content: The client needed a solution to bridge the gap between rural farmers and centralized banking systems. The app allows for real-time account monitoring and secure internal transfers within the cooperative network.
development: Developed using React Native for cross-platform compatibility. We implemented biometric authentication (FaceID/Fingerprint) and end-to-end encryption for all transaction data to meet fintech security standards.
ui_ux_strategy: Accessibility was the primary KPI. We designed high-contrast interfaces and large touch targets to accommodate users working in outdoor environments. Simplified navigation ensures usability for non-tech-savvy demographics.

title: Apex Construction Portfolio
description: A corporate web presence for a leading construction firm, featuring an interactive project gallery and service breakdown.
content: Apex needed to modernize their brand image. The previous site was static and difficult to update. The new solution serves as a dynamic brochure, showcasing their capabilities in high-rise and industrial construction.
development: We utilized a Headless CMS approach to allow the marketing team to update project photos and news without touching code. The frontend is a static site generator for blazing-fast load speeds.
ui_ux_strategy: The design communicates trust and stability. We used a grid-based layout to showcase architectural photography and implemented smooth parallax scrolling to add a sense of depth and modernism.
